title: Can I get into NLU with a rank of 3,767? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey! There seems to be no chances in the merit list of the universities but can definitely apply under the vacancies for the seat you might get lucky in the lower NLU’s so you can keep a keen eye on the vacant seats in the national law universities and you can apply for those. All the best !

In open category your rank have chance after CLAT ADMISSION CLOSES, check MNLU nagpur and AURANGABAD websites,if there's any vacancy you will get an admission on direct approach, stay in touch with universities of lower rank.
